summary: Makes all reasonably cooked food such as meat heal you for a short time - pictures inculded -- Comes with Realistic Needs and Diseases patch!
descriptionHtml:
[size=3] ﻿Requiem's fun but it sucks when you play with any hunger mod and the cooked food you eat doesn't help you with your health problem since requiem has no health regen. Nothing overpowered just enough to help out!

If you use [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26228]Realistic Needs and Diseases[/url] download the patch provided, Also highly recommend having [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/82938]Requiem Food Patch for RND[/url] downloaded make sure this mod is loaded after these two.

[/size][color=#ffff00]List of Food and Affects[/color]
[size=3]﻿Baked Potato - 1 health point for 10 sec
﻿Cooked Salmon - 2 health points for 15 sec
﻿Cooked Slaughterfish - 2 health points for 15 sec
﻿Grilled Leek - 1 health point for 10 sec
﻿Cooked Beef - 3 health points for 10 sec
﻿Roasted Goat Leg - 3 health points for 10 sec
﻿Cooked Horker - 3 health points for 10 sec
﻿Cooked Meat - 3 health points for 10 sec
﻿Cooked Mammoth - 4 health points for 10 sec
﻿Cooked Venison - 3 health points for 10 sec
﻿Cooked Rabit - 2 health points for 15 sec
﻿Cooked Pheasant - 2 health points for 15 sec
﻿Spiced Beef - 3 health points for 15 sec
﻿Marriage Meal - 1 health point for 30 sec
﻿Cooked Skeever - 2 health points for 15 sec
﻿Cooked Chicken - 2 health points for 15 sec
﻿Beef Stew - 3 health points for 30 sec
﻿Horker Stew - 3 health points for 30 sec
﻿Cabbage Potato Soup - 3 health points for 15 sec
﻿Venison Stew - 3 health points for 30 sec
﻿Potato Soup - 2 health points for 20 sec
﻿Cooked Mudcrab - 2 health points for 15 sec
﻿Cooked Salmon - 2 health points for 15 sec
﻿Chicken Dumpling - 2 health points for 15 sec[/size]
author: Dexials
